public class ColourBin
extends java.lang.Object

Represents and SRV internal colour bin.

readResultString

public void readResultString(java.lang.String result)
Parse a result string returned from an SRV1q and set internal parameters accordingly.

Method expects parameters of the form:

    ny1y2u1u2v1v2

Where n is the bin number, y1y2 Y components min and max values, u1u2 U components min and max values and , v1v2 V components min and max values.

Parameters:
result - the string returned from a call to the srv1q's vc command

setYUV

public void setYUV(YUV yuv)
Sets this bin's contents according to the passed YUV and the default threshold value.

Parameters:
YUV -

getParameterString

public java.lang.String getParameterString()
Write the bin's internal parameters to a command string.

Method writes parameters, not a complete command string:

    ny1y2u1u2v1v2

Where n is the bin number, y1y2 Y components min and max values, u1u2 U components min and max values and , v1v2 V components min and max values.

Returns:
String the parameter String
